block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, den, renovated kitchen and bath, h/w floors, 100-sq.-ft. terrace, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,023, 56% tax-deductible; listed at $499,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, den, renovated kitchen and bath, h/w floors, 100-sq.-ft. terrace, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,023, 56% tax-deductible; listed at $499,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; dining room, high ceilings, h/w floors, health club and roof garden in building; maintenance $784, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $395,000 (multiple bids), 8 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker/Hunt Kennedy)

1-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, renovated kitchen, East River view; maintenance $1,008, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $599,000, 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Halstead Property Co.; Bellmarc)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, washer/ dryer in unit, 2 exposures; common charges $549; taxes $4,080; listed at $545,000 (multiple bids), 2 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,713-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, granite kitchen countertops, cherrywood floors, washer/dryer in unit; common charges $723; taxes $3,240; listed at $1.13 million, 25 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, windowed eat-in kitchen, h/w floors, terrace, Hudson River view; maintenance $779, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $259,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Trebach)

99-year-old 2-family detached house; 4 bedrooms in primary unit; 3 bedrooms, dining room in other; eat-in kitchen, 1 bath in each; 2-car garage, 30-by-108-ft. lot; taxes $1,700; listed at $285,000, 22 weeks on market (Brokers: Jeskill; Manchester)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 730-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, high ceilings, h/w floors; maintenance $562, includes gas and electricity, 26% tax-deductible; listed at $149,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Harbor View)

2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a renovated prewar building; dining room, h/w floors, 2 exposures; maintenance $652, 65% tax-deductible; listed at $379,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Orrichio & Anderson)

8-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath brick and frame house built in 1910; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, wraparound porch, c/a, rear deck, finished basement, 63-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,400; listed at $750,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Mary Kay Gallagher)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 65-year-old detached frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, 1-car garage, 24-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,900; listed at $350,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Advantage Forest Hills)

3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 40-year-old detached brick house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, recreation room, c/a, private driveway, 44-by-118-ft. lot; taxes $2,243; listed at $318,000, 7 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/ Millennium)
3-bedroom, 2-bath, 12-year-old town house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, rear deck, c/a; 33-by-97-ft. lot; taxes $900; listed at $159,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Kingsley)

4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 153-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, den, 3 fireplaces, 2-car attached garage, 3.18-acre waterfront lot; taxes $13,200; listed at $1.5 million, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Coach Realtors at Setauket Harbor)

3-bedroom, 1-bath, 72-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, basement, enclosed porch, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,600; listed at $324,000, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Sands port; Town & Country)

3-bedroom, 1-bath, 70-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, finished basement, attic, 1-car garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $5,200, listed at $309,000 (multiple bids), 1 day on market (Broker: Atanas)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 80-year-old frame house; dining area, eat-in kitchen, stone fireplace, h/w floors, 5.75-acre lot; taxes $3,643; listed at $245,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,214-sq.-ft. town-house condo in a 16-year-old building; dining area, fireplace, washer/dryer, rear deck, 1-car garage; common charges $181; taxes $3,326; listed at $264,500, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Connecticut; Coldwell Banker/Norwalk)

4-bedroom, 2-bath, 40-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, family room, fireplace, rear deck, 1-car garage, 701-by-189-ft. lot; taxes $5,297; listed at $550,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Old Greenwich; Country Living)

3-bedroom, 1-bath, 42-year-old ranch; entry hall, dining room, modern eat-in kitchen, deck, detached 2-car garage; 1/4-acre lot; taxes $7,245; listed at $289,000; 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker Gumbo; Houlihan/Lawrence)

5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 77-year-old colonial; family room, fireplace, dining area, powder room, eat-in kitchen, detached garage; 1/4-acre lot; taxes $16,757; listed at $819,000; 5 weeks on market (Brokers: Merritt; Burbank/Whittemore)

4-bedroom, 3-bath, 37-year-old split-level; entry hall, fireplace, dining room, eat-in kitchen, deck, finished basement; 100-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $6,350; listed at $349,000; 21 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; J. Martins)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 29-year-old split-level; patio, deck, eat-in kitchen, family room, 2-car garage, 0.73-acre lot; taxes $5,322; listed at $349,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)
3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 45-year-old raised ranch; h/w floors, eat-in kitchen, finished attic, 45-by-52-ft. lot; taxes $4,734; listed at $138,000, 4 months on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)
5-bedroom, 3-bath, 40-year-old Dutch colonial; in-ground pool, 2 fireplaces, c/a, patio, deck, 75-by-105-ft. waterfront lot; taxes $7,675; listed at $750,000, 4 months on market (Broker: Weichert)

3-bedroom, 1-bath, 60-year-old colonial; fireplace, new roof, full basement, 1-car garage, eat-in kitchen, 50-by-163-ft. lot; taxes $5,173; listed at $339,000, 4 days on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; Weichert)
